resources.name: waqi-feeds
resources.title: City and Geolocated Feeds
resources.description: Collection of WAQI real-time air quality data feeds, including city-based, coordinate-based, and IP-based endpoints.

resources.name: waqi-map-bounds
resources.title: Map Queries
resources.description: Retrieve air quality monitoring stations within a given latitude/longitude bounding box.

resources.name: waqi-search
resources.title: Station Search
resources.description: Search for air quality monitoring stations by name or keyword.
